Notes:
Multiple versions preserved via Harvard Dataverse and Zenodo; interface itself has no DOI.

Beta version unveiled in February 2022 under Biden’s Justice40 initiative. Version 2 was released in December 2024

Covers current and historical EJScreen datasets; prior versions included in record history.

Developed starting in 2010, adopted internally by EPA in 2012, peer-reviewed in 2014, and publicly released in 2015

Exists only as ArcGIS Hub tool; no persistent identifier in DataCite/OSTI. Versions tracked internally (beta 2023, v1.1.0 in 2024).

Released in April 2023,

No DOI issued. Preserved externally by Fulton Ring (GitHub) + Harvard EELP tracker/archive.

Launched in December 2024 and was live until mid-February 2025 when it was removed.
